title: Ep169 Strip Club Crimes
description: This week, the gals glue on their best tassels to chat about an exotic line of work. Topics include some creative entrepreneurial spirit, champagne room shenanigans, and the Russian military equipment black market (who knew?). Enthusiastically pop open a frosty bottle of Dom Pérignon, slather on some coconut oil, tip the bouncer, and tune in for Strip Club Crimes. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
